      • setElement

        public void setElement(int row,
                       int column,
                       T value)
                throws MatrixException
        Description copied from interface: Matrix
        Set element at position (row,column). If the element is not within the matrix, the matrix is left unchanged.
        Parameters:
        row - row of element to set.
        column - column of element to set.
        value - value to store at (row,column).
        Throws:
        MatrixException - if the element position is not within the matrix.
